thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com | 2 of 197
thread.title: Scott Talmadge

author: Scott Talmadge
title: Scott Talmadge
text: I've dealt with mycomicshop more than a few times and find that they are one of the best (if not, THE BEST), comic book store online. They pretty much always grade fairly! Unheard of throughout the industry! Glad to see he holds a steady moral and ethical code that is unsurpassed.The largest selection of comics and related material that I've ever seen in one site!!! All packages are sent quickly (more importantly) and safely. Yes! SAFELY! You're just about guaranteed to receive your comic in the grade they stated when you bought it!!! Shocking almost. What a relief that I found your company. I'll be shopping at mycomicshop a great deal from now on!!!
